alert.note: Alert for Hamilton; Stanton (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 05 at 10:59PM CDT until July 05 at 11:45PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Dodge City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Hamilton County in southwestern Kansas... Northwestern Stanton County in southwestern Kansas... * Until 1145 PM CDT/1045 PM MDT/. * At 1059 PM CDT/959 PM MDT/, a severe thunderstorm was located 18 miles northwest of Manter, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Johnson City. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
